EmailTemplate.description: Financial Aid template for closing case.
EmailTemplate.name: Case Management Financial Aid Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
If you have any questions you may respond to this email within 14 days and your case will be reopened and evaluated by Financial Aid and Scholarship Services.
Please add permissions using My ASU Parent Guest Access if you would like to authorize designated persons to discuss your financial aid.
Financial Aid and Scholarship Services Arizona State University PO Box 870412 Tempe, AZ 85287-0412
